name: Warden of Dunrath - DEMO
description:
A little demo I made for My First Game Jam - Winter 2022 here in itch.io!

As the apprentice of the last remaining Warden in the woods of Dunrath, you'll have a difficult mission thrust upon you. A greedy empire bordering the woods has finally decided to expand into them and they'll destroy everything in their way. As a Warden it's your job to put a stop to this and save your home!

-----

I had much more planned for this. Some stuff is a bit of a placeholder (like the music for example, you might notice the tracks are quite short), as sadly during the project I had a long power outage which took away several precious days of work which I could have used to add more content. Some of the stuff that was cut out includes multiple routes and endings, a skill tree that you can upgrade over time, recruitable allies, summons, shapeshifting magic, spellcasting based on terrain, and a few other things.

If, somehow, this game gets any significant attention then I'd definitely consider giving a shot at properly finishing it. But for my first game jam, even as tiny of a demo as it is (it only has 2 areas...), I'm still satisfied. I learned much and had fun with it, and I'll definitely use what I learned for whatever I work on next in the future.

Enjoy this little prototype and tell me what you think in the comments below!
